metadata.title: CVE-2021-33194 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: golang.org/x/net before v0.0.0-20210520170846-37e1c6afe023 allows attackersto cause a denial of service (infinite loop) via crafted ParseFragmentinput.

criterions.comment: golang-golang-x-net-dev: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
